text: View from a party I went to last night, with NYC skyline in the distance (easier to see IRL than in the photo)

Big day for @circusdotfun and Farcaster.

The airdrop went extremely smoothly. Hats off to @pirosb3 and the team. @linda coordinated the entire process beautifully, making us feel like genuine partners every step of the way.

Here are some thoughts now that the dust has settled:

Thanks to @nickysap for working with us on this first Solana token airdrop to Farcaster users! Huge thanks to @pirosb3 for the custom Solana work and @slokh @blockheim for building the airdrop tool itself

We've got 4 more Solana token airdrops lined up totaling $80k. DM me if you're interested in running an airdrop

cast.text:
The first Solana airdrop to Farcaster users is live!

@circusdotfun from @nickysap

text: For the $CRCS airdrop today, at least $10 in SOL was *one* of the requirements. Among users that had at least $10 in SOL, the Circus team optimized for top 1.5k users based on mix of mini app usage and onchain txns (each team picks different criteria + budget). I also included a large buffer for SOL price fluctuation

cast.text:
The first Solana token airdrop to Farcaster users is $CRCS, here's where you can learn more about the token! https://www.circus.fun/#token

The criteria will be optimizing for a mix of mini app usage, onchain txns, and a Farcaster wallet balance of at least $10 in SOL

Thanks @nickysap for working with us on this!

html.ogDescription: Embedding onchain capabilities directly into the social fabric and transforming online engagement into direct economic participation.

text: We can always improve the airdrops and something we're working on but also can't make everyone happy giving out tokens with a set budget (usually $10K). I do feel happy though in 2 months there's been ~$140K distributed to 10K+ Farcaster users with $125K+ lined up and positive feedback from teams we've worked with

My 2c on Airdrop-Selling drama:

+ I worked with Merkle on an Airdrop. They didn't impose their criteria on us, they helped us to set *our* critieria.

+ Therefore, I think many people are mistakingly taking Dan's comment as a threat "from Dan" when, in fact, it is his observation of what Airdrop Teams will decide for their self-interest.

+ And I'd say Dan's point is directionally correct ‚Äì giving airdrops that seem likely to be insta-sold is less appealing to Teams than the opposite.

+ However, selling does *not* have to overwhelm all other criteria. Eg, if someone is a power-user of many apps and tokens like @tricil.eth, this may be more important to a Team than whether he sold a drop or not.

tldr: Dan's point clearly has merit, but Airdrop Criteria is a unique decision made by each Team (not by Merkle!)

cast.text:
You‚Äôre a developer building a new token-based product.

Your goal is to acquire users for your product. You‚Äôre considering an airdrop as a tactic to do this.

User A 
History of not selling airdrops immediately.

User B
Sells most airdrops immediately.

You can only airdrop to one. Which one do you choose?

text:
I feel like there‚Äôs more of a misunderstanding than disagreement.

If the dev‚Äôs intent is to drive usage of a mini-app, we have to be intellectually honest about that ‚Äî yes, your history of what you‚Äôve done with airdrops and mini-app usage matters. 

If the dev‚Äôs intent is to drive awareness, then maybe OpenRank & historical leaderboard rankings matter more.

Ultimately, it‚Äôs the devs call because they have different goals. 

Fwiw, I rarely qualify for any of these airdrops, so I‚Äôm there with many of you. 

Just carry-on and pretend like there was no airdrop. :)

cast.text:

Your goal is to acquire users for your product. You‚Äôre considering an airdrop as a tactic to do this.

User B

text:
Great feedback from @matthewfox @sayangel on potentially renaming "airdrops" in our program as these are closer to quests/campaigns/rewards. Taking name suggestions and will think on it!

https://farcaster.xyz/matthewfox/0x6a983bff
https://farcaster.xyz/sayangel/0xf84f794e

cast.text:
Think it's calling them airdrops that triggers people since the expectation is random generational wealth

Pressing a button and getting any amount of $ should be a good thing, just feels like expectations are off because of the naming association

My $0.02: consider renaming them. The airdrop word carries a lot of weight in the space that people can‚Äôt part ways with.

Seeing as these tend to be meant to drive traffic they‚Äôre closer to promotions, incentives, rewards.

These are more like when hello fresh offers me $100 in credit to resubscribe.

text: ‚ÄúAirdrops‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúLittle treats‚Äù

Funds will be distributed in you roughly 48 hours.

cast.text:
üöÄ Submissions for Farcaster Spring 2025 RPGF are NOW OPEN! 

Grants reward past work that‚Äôs positively impacted Farcaster. To enter, post your project with #farcasterrpgfspring2025 in the /octant channel‚Äîonly one nomination per person.

text:
GM Farcaster is partnering with @matthewfox @arek and the /fctrivia team to bring Farcaster live trivia each Wednesday at noon ET throughout June! AND we're looking for sponsors to highlight during the game and help support the game and prize pool.

Not familiar with /fctrivia? Check out this montage from our recent /fctrivia during CastOut where we asked Farcaster trivia plus questions about the sponsors (and players even did their homework researching the sponsors prior to the game!)

We just launched a prop to @purple to sponsor 4 games in June plus we have 8 additional spots you can purchase on @highlight. You'll find the links for each week in the replies below. Got questions? drop them in the replies or dc me. 

We can't wait to bring back /fctrivia!

I had this long post written out about channels but did a full 180 by the time I got to the end.

Here‚Äôs how I‚Äôd like to imagine navigating FC, though. I like knowing cozy corners exist even if I don‚Äôt use them often.
Official Channels Day‚ÄîJune 7, 2025

Looking for people to test a big new thing for wallet starting tomorrow.

Reply here if you're interested. Will ping 20 or so of you in the morning.
Over the last few days, the number of daily top-level casts has exceeded the number of replies for the first time ever

What's new with /buoy??

In case you missed it, we've shipped some exciting things since Farcon NYC!!

As a reminder, @buoy is the best way to track keywords on Farcaster. When someone mentions your brand, product, coin, or community, we'll send a realtime notification to your Farcaster app, mobile device, web, and even apps like Slack. It's a perfect way to stay on top of the conversation for things you care about.

üÜï Here's the new stuff

- Get your keyword notifications inside Farcaster, via our new mini-app buoy.club (see below)
- Get superfollow and watch notifications inside mini-app
- Get notified in Telegram, Slack, Discord, (or anywhere) with Buoy Max
- Our mini-app is a mini-Buoy: search Farcaster with advanced filters. We retain everything, so you can find old casts too :)
- We'll be adding a simple way to create keyword notifications in our mini-app in the future!
- Migrated Buoy to Snap-chain
- Migrated from warpcast -> farcaster.xyz links

Great read especially if you‚Äôre new here 

‚ÄúMost people don‚Äôt know how to be interesting, even though everyone has something interesting to share. I think it often comes from self-doubt or fear of rejection. So people hide behind safe, generic content, then wonder why no one is interested.

Only one person on the planet has your exact combination of experiences, curiosities, connections, and tastes.

So write the casts you want to see in your feed. Keep showing up.‚Äù

Honest feedback is welcome. Don't worry about my feelings. I'm more interested in your POV, especially if you have a strong reaction. :)

cast.text:
The Farcaster Vertical Video competition is now live!

1.5 MILLION $PRO IN PRIZES, distributed after 8 hours.

Film a vertical video of yourself talking about one of the following things:
- your favorite Farcaster user
- your favorite part about Farcaster
- your goals for the network

It must be an original video of yourself talking, 1 minute or less.

You must quote cast this post with your video in order to submit.

Submissions close 8 hours after the publication of this cast. 

We will name 5-10 winners.

Happy filming üòç

text:
Nothing beats meeting the love of your life

@bertwurst.eth

Still riding high from yesterday‚Äôs Farcaster Friday meetup!!!
I got to meet so many nice humans (including @ted), collect an overwhelming number of new smells, and ate my first burger!

A full debrief is coming soon (once I‚Äôve processed the sensory overload).

Now it‚Äôs BEACH DAY.
But first, a walk to a coffee shop so the Assistants can caffeinate for the day ahead.
@bertwurst.eth at FC Friday in LA tonight... me, @erica , @thedude & many others extend our heartfelt joy for those of you in LA üíú

cast.text:
GM from the road!!!

Officially en route to Los Angeles. The Assistants claim they packed only the essentials (which apparently includes half the house) and we are now mobile.

I‚Äôve been promised a burger tonight and I‚Äôm already emotionally invested. Drool levels: rising.

LA, I hope you‚Äôre ready for me.

gm gm ‚ù§Ô∏è

We're finally ready to unveil Epoch 8.

ü•Åü•Åü•Å This epoch is an Ethereum-core alignment epoch. It's a special one because it's a major step in our broader roadmap to contribute to Ethereum's growth.

Like Epoch 7, there's no snapshot. Our internal reviewers will select projects based on impact and relevance.

Allocation window remains the same. ETH rewards are time-weighted and allocating to projects get you matched

üóìApplication Deadline: 3 June, 2025 @ 11:59 pm PST

üõ† Who should apply?
Builders advancing Ethereum in 4 core areas:

1) Direct protocol improvements (consensus, execution, data availability, core networking)

2) Shared infrastructure (clients, testnets & tooling, p2p networking stacks, security & formal-verification frameworks, transparency)

3) Open dashboards, datasets, or studies (roll-ups, bridges, MEVs -  resulting insights must strengthen Ethereum)

4) Protocol-level research + specification work (advancing Ethereum's roadmap)

App link + eligibility criteria üëá
